overview_of_class: A student-centered approach to public speaking with emphasis on improving speaking skills, this course includes role-playing, class discussion, laboratory experiences, and speaking performance. Social-psychological aspects of public speaking are also covered. Enrollment is limited. May not be audited. Presented in a five-week format, this course meets for five Saturdays from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm: 9/24, 10/1, 10/8, 10/15, 10/22. First class attendance is mandatory.
name: Public Speaking
subject: COMM_ST
